name: project-manager
title: Project Manager
description: Manages project repositories on the local filesystem.
author: wyattjoh

commands.name: search-projects
commands.title: Search Managed Projects
commands.description: Search projects managed by the project manager along with last modified dates.

preferences.name: directory
preferences.title: Projects Directory
preferences.description: The directory where your projects that this extension is managing is located

preferences.name: openWith
preferences.title: Open With
preferences.description: The application to open projects with

preferences.name: excludePatterns
preferences.title: Exclude Patterns
preferences.description: The patterns to exclude from archiving and stats counting, comma separated

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
